channel.title: (Learning Git in Reverse)
channel.description: A backwards introduction to the information manager from hell

div.p: It is certainly counter-intuitive to learn to drive by first going backwards, so why learn how to use Git in reverse? The short answer is: knowing the internals of Git should make the commands and workflows of Git more accessible and understandable.

blockquote.p: The content of this post is drafted from contents of a similarly titled presentation.

channel.p: We will start by touring the plumbing commands and walk all the way through branching.
